New Indoor Play Area Canberra Centre

Location: Australian Capital Territory,
Date: 6/28/2024
Application: playground

Project Overview

Canberra Centre, a large shopping complex in the Australian Capital Territory (ACT), features over 260 shops, restaurants, and services. The indoor play area is a popular spot where children can enjoy themselves while parents relax. Currently, the play space is undergoing an upgrade with the installation of new Rosehill TPV® softfall surfacing by Bruce’s Playground. This surfacing provides excellent cushioning against slips, trips, and falls.Rosehill TPV® rubber offers unmatched UV resistance, ensuring long-lasting vibrant colours and a soft surface for both indoor and outdoor applications. Our pour-in-place rubber is non-toxic and non-allergenic, free from harmful substances, and does not emit pollutants into the environment.Thanks to Bruce’s Playground and .

Contact us today to discuss how Rosehill TPV® can create safe, vibrant surfaces for your project.
